author: mapellidario
body:
Supersedes #7438.

While we migrate the dmwm/CRABServer code related to crabserver REST interface, we convened that it is convinient to have a single specfile that can build both py2 and py3 environments, so that we do not need to adapt the name of the application (`crabserver`) down the road, for example in in dmwm/CMSKubernetes, dmwm/deployment, in our own code, ...

After the migration is complete, we plan to deprecate all the `%if` statements and to keep the py3 version only.
title: crabserver - single specfile for both py2 and py3 env
